participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Curious and enthusiastic, loves to share what makes him happy.
participant_1.background: I am ten years old and my family is like a library. I live in a nice attic apartment in Portland, OR. I go running a lot. I play for the Baltimore Orioles. My favorite French fries are from McDonald's.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Playful and expressive, enjoys making others smile and has a vivid imagination.
participant_2.background: I love how my skunk purse always makes people laugh. I like to use a lot of exclamation marks when I type. I get along with my family well. I like Toyota cars. I love lasagna like I'm Garfield.

content.text: Great! I just got a new skunk purse and I love it! It makes people laugh!
That's awesome, I love it when people laugh.
Me too! I also love lasagna, it's my favorite food.
Me too! I love lasagna from Olive Garden.
I love all lasagna! I have a pet cat named Garfield and I love to feed him lasagna.
That's so funny! I love Garfield too.
He's the best! I also love my family very much.
That's great! I love my family too.
I'm so glad! I'm going to go play with my cat now.
